Title: Prohibits public display of tobacco advertisements and smoking paraphernalia within one thousand feet of schools
Summary: Prohibits public display of tobacco advertisements and smoking paraphernalia within one thousand feet of child-friendly institutions; defines terms; imposes a maximum penalty of five hundred dollars per violation; exempts tobacco businesses from the prohibition.
LawCode: Add ยง1399-ddd, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to prohibiting public display of tobacco advertisements and smoking paraphernalia within one thousand feet of child-friendly institutions
